price: (Nuko Allah akavuga ati) “Yewe Ibilisi! Ni iki cyakubujije kubamira uwo naremye n’amaboko yanjye yombi? Ese wagize ubwibone cyangwa wiyumva nk’uri mu bo mu nzego zo hejuru?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā manaʿaka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-ʿālīna
